PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-16622003-10-28,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology of CHRISTOPHER J. TERRY of Ottawa, Ontario, as Director of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective February 1, 2004.
